name: Extract invoice and PO data from NetSuite - Download CSV and XLSX
description:
Extract Invoice and PO Data from NetSuite with Koncile OCR

Automatically download invoice or purchase order documents (CSV, XLSX, or PDF) from NetSuite and send them to Koncile for data extraction.

Connect to NetSuite to retrieve new invoice or PO files.

Send documents to Koncile OCR to extract structured data like invoice number, PO number, dates, amounts, and vendor details.

Get clean, structured results — perfect for financial tracking, reconciliation, or integration with your tools (Excel, databases, APIs…).

Simplify your document-based workflows with full automation from NetSuite to structured output.
